description:
In this course we aim to help you understand HTML and CSS better by breaking down the core fundamentals that help you learn HTML and CSS. This course starts you out by showing you important aspects of HTML and then moves on to CSS.

We cover the core fundamentals of HTML and CSS.

Those who want to learn HTML and CSS should take this course. Here is how we teach you.

We use

  • Lectures
  • Hands On Assignments
  • Quizzes

We use these methods to give you a university type setting and feel it is the best way for us to teach you these skills. With Lectures we go over the details of HTML and CSS and explain how things work and should be done. In Hands On Assignments we give you homework which helps push it into your mind and stay there. And in Quizzes we makes sure the knowledge has absorbed. We try to give you a University setting with out the high cost of a University.
title: A Creatives Guide to HTML & CSS: Learn by Building Websites
